entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
